name: Tuut's Tomb
description:
Tuut's Tomb

Made for the Game Maker's Toolkit Jam. Our theme is "Pinball, but no flippers."

Mouse controls only. Left click to make your beetle push the ball away from the mouse, right click to bring the ball to the mouse. Help the beetle get that golden ball.

Press the Escape key any time to reset the game.

--Credits--
